message.content:
cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.FL, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses a methodology for transforming an abstract specification into a concrete implementation using refinement rules, which is a common topic in software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also mentions the use of a model-driven software development tool (rCOS), which falls under programming languages (cs.PL). The use of theorem-provers and formal methods for proving correctness suggests a connection to logic in computer science (cs.LO) and formal languages (cs.FL). Finally, the use of a rewriting tool (Maude) suggests a connection to language and automata theory (cs.LG).
